title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 24 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 24 2022
description:
Clay calls in from family funeral to weigh in on the enormous SCOTUS decision on abortion, Roberts' failure to sign on to overturning Roe, the possibility of violence by the left, Trump's historic and consequential presidency. GOP candidate for Arizona governor Kari Lake puts a CNN reporter in her place. The continuing debate: Who's worse, Fauci or Birx? Buck sums up a big day for conservatism.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
